EmailTemplate.name: Designated person invitation notification - licensee
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - You're invited to be a Designated {!Associations__c.Child_License_Type__c} for {!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c} invited you to be their Designated {!Associations__c.Child_License_Type__c} on {!Associations__c.Current_Datetime__c}.
You must respond by {!Associations__c.Days_From_Today_7__c}.
Respond through our new online system:
Go to {!Associations__c.License_Portal_URL__c}. Login or create a new account and follow instructions.
Questions? Need help? {!Associations__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov APP001
